overview: Seductress Jesse Jane sizzles with desire as a woman on the verge of marriage haunted by a mysterious engagement gift. Overcome by explicit visions of naughty past affairs and the erotic desires of potential new lovers her life is thrown into perverted chaos. Love lust and a desperate need to know what sexual illusions are real and which are fantasy leads her into a delicious and wild explanation of lewd behavior and orgasmic acts.
title: Watching You 3
